timeline.bodyText: Even though DEVICE_SYSTEM_VERSION has the same value, systemVersion, it is prefixed with DEVICE_, which means it is a property of a device record sent to registerDeviceToken. I think in this case it may be better to add another constant.
timeline.author: vbabenkoru

timeline.message:
[MOB-2285] - Add OS version to getMessagesAPI

1. Added systemVersion to getMessageApi json
2. Added test assertion to check if systemVersion is passed
